subject: Re: Frank or any other electronics guru, please help!!
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Debbie,

Those items you're calling clips are actually PC board mounted 
connectors. There are other connectors plugged into those two (wires 
feeding into them). Those connectors that are plugged into the pc 
board mounted connectors are the ones that should have been removed 
(usually by pressing or pulling a small connecting tab which locks 
the two together.

Based on the photo it appears the pc board mounted connectors have 
been torn away from the PC board, ripping away the pc board traces as 
well.  From the looks of a couple of those torn away, it might be 
pretty tough to get them back together, allowing the six connection 
points to have continuity again.

The main thing is that each of those wires need to be connected to 
the points where the pc board traces connect to.

There are work-arounds, but getting the connectors to make good 
connections very easily is going to be a challenge.

- Mike
